channel.title: Codes on Nikiforos Pittaras
channel.description: Recent content in Codes on Nikiforos Pittaras

item.title: Code
item.description: Projects I develop, contribute to or mantain A video / image classification and description wrapper in python3 and tensorflow, found here. The bde event detection module (github) and its corresponding docker image (github, docker hub). Useful stuff (not only) for developers Efficient replacements to the horrible linux man pages, like cheat and tldr. Good terminal editors (i.e., not nano) like emacs or vim or more recent alternatives like micro.
